void FileOutput::WriteString8 ( std::ofstream &  outstr,
const std::string &  value,
int32_t  maxLn 
) [static]

Writes an 8 bit string from a big endian file with a fixed maximum size. If the string length is less than maxLn then null's are appended.

Parameters:
outstr The output file stream.
value The value to write to the file.
maxLn Maximum length of the string.

void FileOutput::WriteBlob ( std::ofstream &  outstr,
const void *  value,
int32_t  size 
) [static]

Writes a blob to a file (as is; no htonl). It is the responsibility of the caller to ensure the blob is in a portable form.

Parameters:
outstr The output file stream.
value A pointer to the blob.
size The size of the blob.

void FileOutput::WriteBlob ( std::ofstream &  outstr,
const void *  value,
int32_t  data_size,
int32_t  reserved_size 
) [static]

Writes a blob to a file with reserved space(as is; no htonl). It is the responsibility of the caller to ensure the blob is in a portable form.

Parameters:
outstr The output file stream.
value A pointer to the blob.
data_size The size of the blob.
reserved_size The size of the reserved space (total size including the blob size).
